publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-803.1 Colin Fox: Impact of Top-up Fees on Higher Education in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-803) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert after "Scottish higher education" "; further believes that education should be paid for through a progressive taxation system that taxes higher earners appropriately, unlike the current British situation; believes, therefore, that society should levy taxes on earning rather than learning,".
